segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the kids sneaking cookies, and I think it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and I hope he doesn’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, and it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be in for a surprise when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s a different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids will get away with it or if the woman will catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is one of those moments that’s both funny and a little scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just life, I guess—chaos and calm all mixed together.
segments.speaker: PAR
